Body:
s = spectrographs.gemini_flamingos.GeminiFLAMINGOS2Spectrograph()
example_file = os.path.join(os.environ['PYPEIT_DEV'], 'RAW_DATA',
    'gemini_flamingos2', 'HK_HK', 'S20161108S0072.fits.gz')
assert os.path.isfile(example_file
    ), 'Could not find example file for Gemini Flamingos2 read.'
det = 1
_, data, hdu, exptime, rawdatasec_img, oscansec_img = s.get_rawimage(
    example_file, det)
bpm = s.bpm(example_file, det)
assert data.shape == (2048, 2048)
assert bpm.shape == (2048, 2048)
dev_suite_required
